title: $:/temp/RemoteAssetInfo/https://tiddlywiki.com/library/v5.1.22/index.html/$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/codemirror-keymap-vim
creator: jack
description: Keymap compatible with Vim for CodeMirror
name: CodeMirror Keymap Vim
readme:
This plugin adds a ''Keymap'' with some of the most important ''Vim'' keyboard shortcuts

For information about available ''keyboard shortcuts'' see the [ext[CodeMirror vim demo|https://codemirror.net/demo/vim.html]]
